snippet: Stocks fell as a Federal Reserve official suggested the central bank could ease up on its monetary stimulus program soon.
abstract: Stocks decline at accelerating pace after Federal Reserve official says that central bank could begin easing up on its monetary stimulus in summer.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell as a Federal Reserve official suggested the central bank could ease up on its monetary stimulus program soon.

headline.main: Investors Take Profits, Leading Indexes Down
headline.print_headline: Investors Take Profits, Leading Indexes Down
